about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for an epic battle against insurmountable odds in "Versus". Take on the role of Zed, the last remaining hope for humanity, as you face off against relentless AI and alien invaders in a desperate struggle to defend our world from total annihilation.

In Versus, you will embark on an immersive and action-packed journey, navigating through breathtaking environments that have succumbed to the chaos of the invasion. Unleash your hero's unique abilities and harness powerful weapons to engage in pulse-pounding combat against waves of relentless enemies.

As Zed, you will delve into a captivating storyline, discovering the dark secrets behind the invasion and uncovering the truth that could save humanity. Traverse through intricately designed levels, from crumbling cityscapes to otherworldly landscapes, all meticulously rendered to bring the intensity of the battle to life.

With each encounter, you'll face formidable AI adversaries and cunning alien forces, each with their own distinct strengths and strategies. Adapt your tactics, upgrade your arsenal, and unlock new weapons to overcome the ever-increasing challenges that await you.

The fate of humanity hangs in the balance. Will you stand as the last line of defense against the AI and alien invasion? Join the battle in Versus and show the world what it truly means to fight for survival.

name: Versus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Versus is an action-packed game combining 2.5D and 3D mechanics. Play as Zed on a mission to the enigmatic island of Isolux, battling fierce enemies and unraveling mysteries that only raise more questions. With unique levels, intense combat, and epic bosses, uncover the secrets lurking in Isolux.
